PackageOracle.name: DA_REFCODE_MAPPING
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_REFCODE_MAPPING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.13.570154000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,src_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name2 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value2 IN VARCHAR2
,order_seq IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,src_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name2 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value2 IN VARCHAR2
,order_seq IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,refcode_mapping_id IN NUMBER
,src_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name2 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value2 IN VARCHAR2
,order_seq IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,refcode_mapping_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_refcode_mapping;

body.name: DA_REFCODE_MAPPING
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_REFCODE_MAPPING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.13.582803000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,src_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name2 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value2 IN VARCHAR2
,order_seq IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_refcode_mapping.add(fx), parms=' || src_table_name || '|' || src_key_column_name || '|' || trg_table_name || '|' || trg_key_column_name || '|' || src_translate_column || '|' || trg_translate_column || '|' || trg_default_column_name1 || '|' || trg_default_value1 || '|' || trg_default_column_name2 || '|' || trg_default_value2 || '|' || order_seq || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_refcode_mapping a
(
a.refcode_mapping_id
,a.src_table_name
,a.src_key_column_name
,a.trg_table_name
,a.trg_key_column_name
,a.src_translate_column
,a.trg_translate_column
,a.trg_default_column_name1
,a.trg_default_value1
,a.trg_default_column_name2
,a.trg_default_value2
,a.order_seq
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_refcode_mapping_id.NEXTVAL
,add.src_table_name
,add.src_key_column_name
,add.trg_table_name
,add.trg_key_column_name
,add.src_translate_column
,add.trg_translate_column
,add.trg_default_column_name1
,add.trg_default_value1
,add.trg_default_column_name2
,add.trg_default_value2
,add.order_seq
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.refcode_mapping_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_refcode_mapping.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,src_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name2 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value2 IN VARCHAR2
,order_seq IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_refcode_mapping.add, parms=' || src_table_name || '|' || src_key_column_name || '|' || trg_table_name || '|' || trg_key_column_name || '|' || src_translate_column || '|' || trg_translate_column || '|' || trg_default_column_name1 || '|' || trg_default_value1 || '|' || trg_default_column_name2 || '|' || trg_default_value2 || '|' || order_seq || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_refcode_mapping a
(
a.refcode_mapping_id
,a.src_table_name
,a.src_key_column_name
,a.trg_table_name
,a.trg_key_column_name
,a.src_translate_column
,a.trg_translate_column
,a.trg_default_column_name1
,a.trg_default_value1
,a.trg_default_column_name2
,a.trg_default_value2
,a.order_seq
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_refcode_mapping_id.NEXTVAL
,add.src_table_name
,add.src_key_column_name
,add.trg_table_name
,add.trg_key_column_name
,add.src_translate_column
,add.trg_translate_column
,add.trg_default_column_name1
,add.trg_default_value1
,add.trg_default_column_name2
,add.trg_default_value2
,add.order_seq
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_refcode_mapping.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,refcode_mapping_id IN NUMBER
,src_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_table_name IN VARCHAR2
,trg_key_column_name IN VARCHAR2
,src_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_translate_column IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value1 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_column_name2 IN VARCHAR2
,trg_default_value2 IN VARCHAR2
,order_seq IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_refcode_mapping.add, parms=' || refcode_mapping_id || '|' || src_table_name || '|' || src_key_column_name || '|' || trg_table_name || '|' || trg_key_column_name || '|' || src_translate_column || '|' || trg_translate_column || '|' || trg_default_column_name1 || '|' || trg_default_value1 || '|' || trg_default_column_name2 || '|' || trg_default_value2 || '|' || order_seq || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_refcode_mapping a
(
a.refcode_mapping_id
,a.src_table_name
,a.src_key_column_name
,a.trg_table_name
,a.trg_key_column_name
,a.src_translate_column
,a.trg_translate_column
,a.trg_default_column_name1
,a.trg_default_value1
,a.trg_default_column_name2
,a.trg_default_value2
,a.order_seq
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.refcode_mapping_id
,add.src_table_name
,add.src_key_column_name
,add.trg_table_name
,add.trg_key_column_name
,add.src_translate_column
,add.trg_translate_column
,add.trg_default_column_name1
,add.trg_default_value1
,add.trg_default_column_name2
,add.trg_default_value2
,add.order_seq
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_refcode_mapping.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,refcode_mapping_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_refcode_mapping.del, parms=' || refcode_mapping_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_refcode_mapping a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.refcode_mapping_id = del.refcode_mapping_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_refcode_mapping.del');

END del;

END da_refcode_mapping;
